hero.description: The European AI cloud built for developers. We provide secure, compliant infrastructure for AI applications, combining enterprise-grade security with modern developer experience - featuring simple service management, AI/DevOps marketplace, team autonomy, Infra-as-Code and full GitHub integration - all powered by Swedish data centers.

hero.title: About Berget AI
hero.description: Building the future of European AI infrastructure

origin.title: Our Story
origin.description: Berget AI was born out of the realization that many organizations are hindered in their pursuit of AI driven innovation - be it legal and regulatory concerns, not having the skills or capital to run train and host your own AI models, not wanting to invest upfront in GPUs, or simply not having access to relevant local language capable LLMs.
origin.nameOrigin: The name is Swedish for "mountain", which we have plenty of in Sweden, many of which host underground Data Centers. So why have your data in the cloud when you can have in "Berget"?

openSource.title: Open Source & Community
openSource.description: We are passionate about Open Source and Community Driven Innovation and are true believers that open source is key for safe, transparent and cost efficient AI in the future. History has plenty of examples where a determined community can overcome seemingly impossible obstacles, innovate new tools and create worldwide standards, that are open, interoperable and accessible and affordable for all.

european.title: European Innovation
european.description: We are passionate about European competitiveness overall, and in particular in the field of AI. Europe needs to have its own AI agenda, innovation system and sovereignty, especially in an increasingly volatile geopolitical context. It needs to be enabled by EU and its members states, and driven by businesses, organizations and communities.

integrity.title: Integrity & Privacy
integrity.description: We think integrity, data privacy and regulations are good as long as it ensures a level playing field, fosters simplicity over complexity and ensures openness and broad participation. We want to be a key enabler for European organizations and unlock AI innovations in a safe and responsible way.

promises.title: Our Customer Promises
promises.description: What you can expect when working with us
list: An easy way to build AI applications
Affordable and fair, no lock-ins, no hidden fees
A simple way to be compliant to key regulatory frameworks
Developer friendly, built by developers for developers
In constant state of innovation and listen to what our customers need
Contributing to positive and sustainable societal progress

team.title: Our Team
team.description: We are entrepreneurs and founders with decades of experience in technology and AI

christian.name: Christian Landgren
christian.bio: 30 years of experience helping organizations with digitalization and AI, passionate about AI and software development, deeply engaged in open source and open innovations, trusted advisor to government and public sector, challenger and technology optimist

andreas.name: Andreas Lundmark
andreas.bio: Andreas was an integral part of building the AI capabilities at Boston Consulting Group (BCG Gamma) where he led the Nordic team and was globally responsible for the "AI at Scale" topic, and led multiple large scale data and AI transformations at leading global brands

john.name: John Angelmo
john.bio: A networking and kubernetes wizard with extensive experience in building and managing large-scale Kubernetes based infrastructure

johan.name: Johan Lahti
johan.bio: A leading Data Center network designer and builder who has helped leading enterprises and scale-ups build global multi-site datacenter deployments

whatIsGitOps.description: GitOps brings the best practices of software development to infrastructure management. Version control, collaboration, and automated deployments - all through Git.
